attributes.action: Completely Ban the sale of Fireworks and attend organised displays on 5th Nov
attributes.background:
Each year I look forward to attending my local organised Firework event on the 5th of November. However for weeks if not months leading up to and after this night, the sale of fireworks begin.
The bangs get louder & continue all night effecting the elderly, PTSD suffers along with people's pets

rejection.details:
We already have three petitions on the subject of restricting the sale of fireworks:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109702

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109111

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/110683
